author: The Film Theorists
description:
😱 *Subscribe for more analog horror lore!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

The creator of the “Boiled One” and “The Oddity Compendium” is back with a BRAND NEW analog horror video that picks up on the earliest bits of lore he ever created. This weird, terrifying new video has me asking….what the heck is Smilehood!?
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

title: Film Theory: WTF is Smilehood?
